  list_tasks[[3]]$answers,
  list_tasks[[4]]$answers,

  list_tasks[[6]]$answers
)

# create logical vector indication true answers by asking if answers in answerlist are in selected_task$answers
solution <- answerlist %in% selected_task$answers
